# probableWebSearch

**Instance Property**

A string that the data detection system identifies as a probable web search item, suitable for implementing “Paste and Search”.

## Declaration

```swift
var probableWebSearch: String { get }
```

## Email and web values

- **emailAddresses**: An array of email addresses that the data detection system identifies.
- **links**: An array of web links that the data detection system identifies.
- **probableWebURL**: A string that the data detection system identifies as a probable web URL, suitable for implementing “Paste and Go”.

items.description: An array of email addresses that the data detection system identifies.
items.name: emailAddresses

items.description: An array of web links that the data detection system identifies.
items.name: links

items.description: A string that the data detection system identifies as a probable web URL, suitable for implementing “Paste and Go”.
